name: cenozoic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
from or referring to the period of time that started about 65 million years ago and includes the present time, known especially for the development of mammals: There's a lot of interest in Cenozoic mammals that may have co-existed with man. The Quaternary is a geological period of the Cenozoic era, extending from 2 million years ago to the present day.

Specific periods of time
the Cenozoic
the period of time that started about 65 million years ago and includes the present time, known especially for the development of mammals: The Cenozoic is the most recent of the four eras of geological time, beginning around 65 million years ago. The elements of human beings' unique evolutionary pathway can be traced to the start of the Cenozoic.
